document_data.name: Hitch
document_data.mainbody: '''Hitch''' was an [[adventurer]] active in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Personality: Quick-witted and roguishly charming, Hitch had ambitions of amassing a fortune of [[gold]]. He was not particularly proud of his mildly nefarious past.
document_data.Abilities: He was equally proficient at using his [[dagger]]s for stabbing and for throwing.
document_data.Possessions: Hitch owned a pair of ''[[boots of spider climbing]]'', as well as a ''[[ring of true sight]]'', and an ''[[immovable rod]]''.
document_data.History: Originally from [[Durpar]], Hitch was practically born into a life of miscreancy. He fell in with the [[Zhentarim]] for a while, but eventually broke ties and established himself as an adventurer of some note on the [[Sword Coast]].
